topics.body:
Apparently, Volume 9 of One Punch man comes with a Drama CD that's a parody of Momotaro starring the cast of One-punch man.

Makoto Furukawa as Saitama (himself)
Kaito Ishikawa as Genos (dog)
Aoi Yuki as Tornado of Terror (pheasant)
Takahiro Sakurai as Zombieman (monkey)
Yuichi Nakamura as Licenseless Rider (Momtaro)
Yuuki Kaji as Speed of Sound Sonic (cat)
Hiroki Yasumoto as King (lion)
Kazuhiro Yamaji as Silver Fang (old man & narrator)
Katsuyuki Konishi as Tanktop Master (ogre)

topics.body:
Hey, who wants to read some "insane goddamn bullshit?":http://www.bentoandstarchky.com/dec/rants.htm

These are the collected rants of noted lunatic, Francis E. Dec and it makes fucking Time Cube and David Icke look completely goddamn rational by comparison!

Dec was a lawyer who callapsed into paranoid schitzophrenia in the 60s and was kind enough to share his absolute fucking insanity with the world in the form of mass mailing his deluded ravings to random people and organizations for reasons that I'm sure made sense to him at the time.

Now I know what you're thinking. "Uncle gasmask, are these ramblings racist as all fuck?" You'd better believe they fucking are boys and girls!
